channel.title: Help me. (hosting)
channel.description: well i want to set up my own web hosting service thing i will be offering 100mb diskspace and not sure about the bandwidth. so how will i do that?

item.title: Help me. (hosting)
item.dc:creator: @Winter_Ice Winter Ice
item.description:
@Winter_Ice wrote:

its ok i have enuf room for 1000 coustomers filling all the space (thats just on my comp) and its not my money (dads) he has enuf anyways (he owns 2 buisneses and 20 somthings houses XD) and i also want to host my own website so i dont have to worry about filling the 2000mb lol)

Read full topic

item.title: Help me. (hosting)
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Winter Ice:

well i want to set up my own web hosting service thing i will be offering 100mb diskspace and not sure about the bandwidth. so how will i do that?

In all honesty you probably won’t. People don’t just wake up one day and decide they’re going to do something; especially when it’s business related. Doing such a thing costs money, and with such a business there’s a good chance you’ll lose money.

Read full topic
